screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Google Play Store page for the Walmart Shopping & Grocery app. It shows the app's name, rating (4.7 stars), and the number of downloads (50M+). The description highlights the app’s features such as fast delivery, aisle finder, and real-time order tracking. There is an "Install" button for downloading the app and information on data safety and privacy practices.
action_think: The user has requested to uninstall the 'Walmart Shopping & Grocery' app. However, the current screen shows that the app is not yet installed on the device, indicated by the presence of the 'Install' button. Therefore, there is no action required to fulfill the user’s request to uninstall an app that is not installed.
action_plan: No actions needed since the app is not installed.
action_desc: Inform the user that the 'Walmart Shopping & Grocery' app is not installed on the device and so does not require uninstallation.
action_result: The execution of user request is stopped.
